this_title: Horizon Pluto: Back From the Dead
trans_title: 地平线系列之冥王星：死而复生
introduction: The incredible story of how Pluto has been propelled from an unremarkable ball of ice on the edge of the solar system to a world of unimaginable complexity - where some form of alien life might exist.Featuring first-hand accounts of the incredible discoveries made by New Horizons from many of the scientists involved in the mission.
chinese_title: 地平线系列之冥王星：死而复生
foreign_title: Horizon Pluto: Back From the Dead
